doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Al Mamun Hamid is a dedicated ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat) specialist and Head Neck Surgeon in Chattogram, holding qualifications of MBBS, FCPS (ENT), DLO (BSMMU), and BCS (Health). He is currently serving as a Consultant in the ENT Department at Chittagong Medical College Hospital. doctor.info: Dr. Mrityunjay Barua is a ENT Specialist in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), DLO (BSMMU). He is a Consultant (ENT) at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Lab Seven Health Care, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Mrityunjay Barua at Lab Seven Health Care, Chittagong is 6.30pm to 8pm (Sat, Mon, Tue & Wed).

chamber.address: 102 (2nd Floor), O.R Nizam Road, Panchlaish, Chittagong
